snippet: Millions of migrants have fled war and poverty in their homelands. But two reports on Tuesday highlighted the perils they face as they seek refuge in other countries.
abstract: International Organization for Migration report finds 5,400 migrants died worldwide during attempted border crossings in 2015, including 3,770 who died trying to reach Europe via Mediterranean Sea; report's conclusions highlighted.
